notification_list.title: Orders Cancelled!
notification_list.message: You have canceled an order at Burger Hut. We apologize for your inconvenience. We will try to improve our service next time 🥲

notification_list.title: Orders Successful!
notification_list.message: You have placed an order at Burger Hut and paid $24. Your food will arrive soon. Enjoy our services 😊

notification_list.title: New Services Available!
notification_list.message: You can now make multiple food orders at one time. You can also cancel your orders.

notification_list.title: Credit Card Connected!
notification_list.message: Your credit card has been successfully linked with Foodu. Enjoy our services.

notification_list.title: Account Setup Successful!
notification_list.message: Your account creation is successful, you can now experience our services.
